Using the build from 200604070923 on both Windows (workbench) and z/os Agent Controller, I am unable to execute a test.  The error I get is:

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError:rc=0
    at junit.framework.Assert.fail(Assert.java:47)
    at junit.framework.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:20)
    at atest.T1.executeRequest(T1.java:167)
    at test.T1.c1GETWww_google_com(T1.java:125)
    at sun.reflect.NatriveMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:79)
 ...

This seems like a normal 'can't communicate with agent controller' but I may be wrong.  The RAC on z/OS started up fine with no errors and appears to be ready for requests.

The same test run successfully using agent controllers from windows, solaris and rhel platforms.
